#: Amandine Conrad, Elioth, june 2021, based on the work of Arnaud Sanson, march 2020        #
GET WEIBULL PARAMETERS - CASE INPUT FILE                         #
o csvFile // string // name of the csv file                                            #
o dataName // string // name of the data series                                        #
+ zeros // float // default value: 0.05 // Replacement value for the zeros. The        #
does not bear the actual 0. 0.05 is a good value for wind speed data sets.       #
-To comment: create a dict entry with '#' key                                          #
-All the entries are written as python dict and are separated by a comma               #
